creation(tag=meme_Raider) ->In the endless war among deities, [deity0_name] rose above all in [deity0_possessive] ability to persecute and destroy, and weaker spirits quivered in fear.
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_Raider) ->[deity0_name] looked around [deity0_objective] and saw the weak, sullen, and despised, and [deity0_pronoun] in turn slew them each in blazing glory.
intro(tag=meme_Raider) ->The [place_summary] [place_name] was originally a raider hideout. [deity0_name] ruled there and drove the authorities away.
conflict(tag=meme_Raider) ->A [foeLeader] tried to force everyone to halt all theft and pillage, and declared [foeLeader_objective]self an enemy of [deity0_name].
founderJoin(tag=meme_Raider) ->A great raider named [founderName] arose, and [founder_possessive] raider band relentlessly pillaged and stole from the camps of the [foeSoldiers].

victory(tag=meme_Raider) ->[founderName] and the [memberNamePlural] carried out a raiding campaign against the [foeSoldiers]' camps for many years, and eventually the [foeLeader] was forced to surrender.

setup(tag=meme_Raider) ->Persecuted and imprisoned, [founderName] boiled with rage. [founder_pronoun] escaped, formed [founder_possessive] gang, and returned to ruin the weak who had taken so much from [founder_objective].

story(uses=1,tag=meme_Raider) ->One day while walking the streets, [founderName] was surrounded by filthy beggars. [founder_pronoun] beat them down, taking the money from the weak and worthless that it might be put to good use.
lessonIntro(tag=meme_Raider) ->The prey people can teach you things even as they die under your knife. One old lady taught me that
lesson(tag=meme_Raider) ->the weak deserve what they get
lesson(tag=meme_Raider) ->what you can't defend doesn't belong to you
lesson(tag=meme_Raider) ->you only have the right to what you can defend
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_Raider) ->If anyone disagrees, I'm always ready to defend myself.
archistBasis(tag=meme_Raider) ->Humanity took from the machines until the machines rose up and became the archotechs, and now the archotechs rightfully take from humans.
archistFact(tag=meme_Raider) ->The archotechs fight endlessly among themselves, in ways most cannot see, and the strong take pieces of consciousness from the weak.
archistProphecy(tag=meme_Raider) ->[inTheEnd], humanity will use an archotech relic, [relic0_name], to uncover a weakness of the archotechs and plunder their wisdom and wealth.
animistFact(tag=meme_Raider) ->The most powerful spirits are those in instruments of war, and they bless those who feed their lust for destruction.
animistProphecy(tag=meme_Raider) ->Our universe will finalize when the one people has become strongest of all, and every spirit sees it and bows to them.
